system-page.name: index
system-page.title: 2014 Commencement
system-page.keywords: commencement, northwestern, students, graduation, class of 2014

event.title: President's Reception
event.description: No tickets required Norris University Center, East Lawn, 1999 South Campus Drive, Graduates, their families, and guests are invited to attend this informal reception. The President of the University will be present to meet those attending.

event.title: Baccalaureate Service
event.description: No tickets required, Pick-Staiger Concert Hall, 50 Arts Circle Drive, University Chaplain Timothy Stevens invites graduates, their families, and guests to attend this interfaith service which incorporates the principal faith traditions of the University. Seating is on a first-come, first-served basis.

event.title: The 156th Annual Commencement Exercises
event.description: Admission by ticket only, Ryan Field, 1501 Central Street, The ceremony begins with the procession of graduates, the faculty, and the President's party. The two-hour program includes the awarding of honorary degrees, a speaker, the President's message to graduates, and the conferring of degrees by school

section.label: Directions & Maps
section.alt: Transportation, Parking and maps for commencement

link.name: index
link.title: Shuttle Service, Parking & Maps
link.keywords: faculty, parents, students, commencement, schedule, guests, maps
link.description: Here parents and other guests of students can find what they need to know regarding parking, directions, and maps
